Name: Hidden Objects: Tranquil Valley
About the game: About the game Welcome to the peaceful nature of Tranquil Valley! In this relaxing Hidden Object Game you'll scour for dozens of objects hidden around the environment. The game offers two modes: In Zen Mode you'll be looking for objects without a time limit. Autosave is enabled. In Time Attack however you'll race against the clock. Finding an object grants you a time bonus. Saving disabled. Both modes have their own set of achievements to pursue. Required objects are randomly selected each time you play so no session is like another. Features calm, meditative atmosphere in the beautiful Tranquil Valley full 3D visuals relaxing music two game modes, Zen and Time Attack Achievement for both modes
